Package org.apache.lenya.cms.usecase

Interface Summary
Usecase Usecase interface.
UsecaseInvoker This service allows to invoke a usecase in a convenient way.
UsecaseResolver Usecase resolver interface.
 

Class Summary
AbstractUsecase Abstract usecase implementation.
DocumentUsecase Extends AbstractUsecase with document helper methods.
DummyUsecase Usecase for presentation purposes using a plain JX template.
StateMachine A simple state machine.
StateMachine.Model A state machine model.
StateMachine.Transition A transition switches from a source state to a destination state if an event is invoked.
UsecaseMessage A message in a usecase.
UsecaseView Information about a usecase view.
 

Exception Summary
UsecaseException Usecase exception.
